links.description: Tesla, Inc. (TSLA) shares were closed at $343.06 a share in the latest session and the stock value loss almost -2.26% since the beginning of this year. The company has managed to keep price to sales ratio of 4.82. The price to sales ratio is the ratio of the market value of equity to the sales.

links.description: Suspect arrested by police after allegedly confronting driver in downtown Santa Barbara A man who apparently harbors a strong dislike for Tesla automobiles was arrested Wednesday afternoon in downtown Santa Barbara after he allegedly confronted the driver of one of the pricey electric cars, according to the Santa Barbara Police Department.

messages.body: $TSLA Why? Why is this still trading at these ridiculous multiples? Love Elon, but the stock is a joke.

Tesla Motors wants to open a store in Buffalo Niagara. Here's why it can't. 
 
http://buffalonews.com/2018/02/28/tesla-motors-wants-to-open-a-store-in-buffalo-niagara-heres-why-it-cant/ $TSLA #Tesla #ElonMusk #Buffalo #NewYork

links.title: Tesla Motors wants to open a store in Buffalo Niagara. Here's why it can't.
links.description: Tesla wants to open a store in the Buffalo area to showcase its electric cars. But the company faces a roadblock. For decades, state law has required automakers to sell new vehicles to customers only through franchised dealers. Tesla operates differently, selling directly to customers through its own stores, which has put the automaker at odds with dealers.

symbols.title: Chemical & Mining Co. of Chile Inc.

links.title: Lithium Bull Running On Fumes, by @Goldfinger
links.description: The lithium bull market of the last 2 1/2 years has been powerful and created many millionaires, and new companies, in the process. With lithium carbonate prices soaring from roughly US$4,000 per ton in 2011 to more than US$20,000 per ton (for battery grade material in China) last year the hunt has been on globally to find the next economic lithium deposits that will help fuel the electric vehicle revolution.
